puzzle.title: The Folly of Grand Ambition
puzzle.intro: Embark on a journey to uncover the identity of a collective entity whose audacious plans met an unexpected, powerful end. This narrative serves as a profound reminder of divine might and the fragility of worldly power when it opposes the sacred. Unravel the mystery of this group, whose story is etched in the Quran as a warning for all who seek to transgress.
clues: We harbored a grand ambition, believing our might was unmatched, and set forth on a journey with a clear, destructive objective.
Our leader, filled with arrogance, sought to defile a sacred House revered by many, aiming to divert pilgrimage to a structure built by us.
From a distant land, we marched with a massive force, confident in our ability to dismantle the ancient edifice in the Holy City.
Our army was formidable, spearheaded by magnificent creatures, a sight rarely, if ever, witnessed in such a campaign by the inhabitants of the land we invaded.
When we reached our destination, a divine intervention occurred; small, winged creatures appeared, pelting us with stones of baked clay.
Our entire expedition met a devastating end, leaving our formidable force utterly annihilated, like chewed-up straw, our grand plan reduced to dust.
puzzle.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
puzzle.verse: Have you not considered, [O Muḥammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant? (105:1)
